ing: 1 (9 inch) prepared chocolate cookie pie crust (such as OreoÂ®)
n: Rich and Easy No Cook Peanut Butter Pie
des: "This incredibly rich peanut butter pie can be made in about 10 minutes, left to chill overnight, and is utterly fantastic."
ins: Combine peanut butter, sugar, butter, vanilla extract, and salt in a mixer; beat until mixed. Whisk heavy cream in a separate bowl until frothy; add to peanut butter mixture and beat until smooth and creamy. Pour peanut butter mixture into prepared chocolate cookie pie crust. Cover and chill in refrigerator until set, at least 12 hours.
